text: = One of the main arguments for using the MVC pattern is to reduce the probability of maintaining multiple instances of the same code. = The practice of keeping your code streamlined and using reusable components as much as possible is know as the DRY philosophy = “Don’t Repeat Yourself”: every piece of knowledge must have a single, authoritative representation within a system. v Opposed to WET: We Enjoy Typing/Write Everything Twice/Write Every Time...
